div.p: General overview of the sea-ice cover, experimental model domains and N-ICE 2015 campaign drifts. Background: mean sea ice concentration in January–February 2015 according to OSI-SAF data; A: model domain for the AA (control) experiment, B: model domain for the AA-snow (sensitivity) experiment; coloured curves: trajectories of the different N-ICE 2015 campaign legs; inset: trajectories of N-ICE 2015 drifts and restored true colour image retrieved from MODIS radiances showing the ice cover on 3 April 2015. Leg 1: 15 January–21 February; leg 2: 24 February–19 March; leg 3: 18 April–5 June; leg 4: 7 June–22 June
